statements: DELETE FROM player_achievements WHERE reward_given = TRUE;
DELETE FROM player_achievements WHERE player_id = 1 AND milestone_reached = TRUE;
DELETE FROM player_achievements WHERE achievement_name LIKE '%completed';
DELETE FROM player_achievements WHERE player_id = 2 AND reward_given = FALSE;
DELETE FROM PlayerAchievements WHERE player_id = 1 AND achievement_id = 100
DELETE FROM player_achievements WHERE player_id = 1 AND achievement_id = 10;
DELETE FROM player WHERE player_id = 1 AND level > 5;
DELETE FROM achievements WHERE achievement_id IN (SELECT achievement_id FROM player_achievements WHERE player_id = 2);
DELETE FROM player_achievements WHERE player_id = 3 AND achieved_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM achievements WHERE player_id = 10 AND achievement_name = 'First Achievement';
DELETE FROM players WHERE player_id NOT IN (SELECT player_id FROM player_rewards);
